posting_body: $2500 Beautiful 3bed/1Bath, laundry in unit, steps to T/bus, September 1st  (Brighton, BC, BU, Commonwealth Ave)
Large 3BR apartment on 2nd floor of nice building in desirable and nearby T-Stop location
$2500 with HEAT, HOT WATER and ONE PARKING INCLUDED
* Excellent location on Chiswick Rd to Commonwealth Ave, near to BC/BU, Cleveland Circle.
* 2-3 min walk to Green B Line Chiswick Rd T-Stop, or BC shuttle bus stop
* Open-concept living room and eat-in kitchen
* Heat, Hot water and one Parking are included.
* Gas stove, Dishwasher, Food Disposal and ALL Hardwood Floor.
Please contact to owner by text, call or Email.
Please note, my current tenants are long term tenants stayed at my unit for many years.
All photo showing here were few years ago from previous tenants.
